short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pizza Maker - Cooking Game available on Chrome Browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like Italian üáÆüáπ Pizza üçï making ? if yes, then become a cooking pizza maker and learn from our best girl pizza chef who makes the most delicious and yummy pizzas in italy using her secret recipe !


Go to the Extension tab (in the top-right side, between search address and settings, you have to click a gray piece ). After you open the Extension tab, pin Pizza Maker - Cooking Game extension. Now, whenever you want to play, just click the extension located in the top-right corner.
